alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 2:40AM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches, heaviest amounts nearest the Bighorns. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Expect blowing snow and significantly reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday commutes. The cold and wet conditions will be dangerous for young livestock.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
